attributes.comment:
DHS Docket No. USCIS- 2006-0044

I am writing concerning the proposed increase in fees for adoption-related petitions.
Adoption is already very expensive and to raise fees by up to 66% for adoption-
related petitions seems unnecessary. Many people are already discouraged from
adoption due to the costs and these increases could easily limit even more, those
that are willing to go forward with the process. Another issue is the fact that, in
some cases, the adoption process is so lengthy, that individuals end up having to
obtain and pay for some of these petitions twice. Please consider leaving the
costs for adoption-related petitions at their current prices. You could make a
difference in a child's life by helping to ease the financial burden of those
considering adding a child to their family through adoption.

Thank you
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Tish Rhodus
